headline: Tracking Lone Pine Capital Portfolio - Q4 2024 Update
summary: Lone Pine Capital's 13F portfolio value increased slightly from $13.41B to $13.47B. Check out the new stakes and significant stake additions to the portfolio.

headline: KKR Trying To Become 'Mini Berkshire'
summary: KKR & Co. is planning to hold some investments for decades, directed by a tight-knit group including co-founders Henry Kravis and George Roberts, to build a portfolio that generates over $1 billion in dividends per year. Bloomberg's Sonali Basak has more on KKR's drive to become a 'mini Berkshire.'
